spec_scores.notes: Perfect spec. Crystal clear objectives with O(1) explicitly stated. All sections comprehensive (7 assumptions, 4 acceptance criteria groups, 4 user scenarios with code, 6 edge cases, 10 out-of-scope items). User scenarios directly map to test cases. Scope exactly matches feature description with appropriate exclusions.

plan_scores.notes: Optimal HashMap + Doubly Linked List approach. Considers alternatives (OrderedDict) with honest tradeoffs. All algorithms presented as clear pseudocode with numbered steps. Covers all aspects: data structures, operations, helpers, edge cases, testing strategy, complexity analysis. Highly implementable with concrete pointer operations and 5-phase priority.

implementation_scores.notes: 13 perfectly atomic tasks. Each independently implementable with clear objective, instructions (often with code snippets), and acceptance criteria. Covers everything: data structures, helpers, core ops, docs, testing (basic/edge/performance), review. Sequencing is flawless: foundation → helpers → operations → documentation → testing → review.
